医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
肝晚期疟疾疫苗可提供 89% 的保护并增强细胞免疫具有延长肝期停滞 (GA2) 的基因减毒疟疾寄生虫在临床试验中显示出 89% 的保护率，超过了早期的候选疫苗，并凸显了细胞免疫的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Late-liver-stage-malaria-vaccine-delivers-8925-protection-and-boosts-cellular-immunity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Late-liver-stage-malaria-vaccine-delivers-8925-protection-and-boosts-cellular-immunity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=97ffd142-a3d9-46c5-9e4a-947f8b5f7ad8 Tue, 26 Nov 2024 22:18:00 -0500 Late-liver-stage malaria vaccine delivers 89% protection and boosts cellular immunity
科学家开发出研究疟疾粘性蛋白的方法科学家们推出了一种新工具，用于研究疟原虫高度可变的特征，这些特征使疟原虫能够粘附在红细胞上并逃避免疫系统。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Scientists-develop-method-to-study-malarias-sticky- Proteins.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Scientists-develop-method-to-study-malarias-sticky- Proteins.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4393b2a3-8354-45e4-8147-73450edad0ec Tue, 26 Nov 2024 22:03:00 -0500 Scientists develop method to study malaria's sticky proteins
心血管疾病风险与男性早期大脑衰退有关一项长期研究的发现表明，患有心血管疾病危险因素（包括肥胖）的男性，从 50 多岁到 70 多岁，比同样受影响的 60 多岁到 70 多岁的女性早十年面临大脑健康衰退。学期研究，在线发表在《神经病学神经外科与精神病学杂志》上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Cardioangio-disease-risk-linked-to-early-brain-decline-in-men.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Cardioangio-disease-risk-linked-to-early-brain-decline-in-men.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2d7f5b01-da54-4e13-93e0-c3197d144c43 Tue, 26 Nov 2024 21:59:22 -0500 Cardiovascular disease risk linked to early brain decline in men
睡眠不规律可能会增加重大心血管事件的风险《流行病学与社区杂志》在线发表的研究发现，不规则的睡眠-觉醒周期与心脏病和中风等重大心血管事件的风险增加有关，即使对于那些遵守建议的夜间睡眠时间的人来说也是如此健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Irregular-sleep-may-elevate-risk-of-major-cardioangio-events.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Irregular-sleep-may-elevate-risk-of-major-cardioangio-events.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8fd4b1c2-97da-4ef9-9a85-e91a970548f2 Tue, 26 Nov 2024 21:56:35 -0500 Irregular sleep may elevate risk of major cardiovascular events
埃默里大学医院在美国首次植入新型心室辅助装置11 月 18 日，埃默里大学医院 (EUH) 的心力衰竭和移植团队创造了历史，在美国进行了首次手术植入全新类型的心室辅助装置 (VAD)，该装置提供了关键护理对于心脏衰竭的患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Emory-University-Hospital-performs-first-US-implant-of-novel-心室-assist-device.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Emory-University-Hospital-performs-first-US-implant-of-novel-心室-assist-device.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=587244d3-5b4f-4e9b-a6b9-bd088c06151a Tue, 26 Nov 2024 21:52:34 -0500 Emory University Hospital performs first U.S. implant of novel ventricular assist device
研究强调多喝水对健康的关键益处公共卫生建议通常建议每天喝八杯水。许多人只是认为多喝水有益健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Research-highlights-key-health-benefits-of-drinking-more-water.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Research-highlights-key-health-benefits-of-drinking-more-water.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=87d311e9-eda9-4b7c-abbb-bf82d35c3140 Tue, 26 Nov 2024 21:46:53 -0500 Research highlights key health benefits of drinking more water
抑郁症会增加经痛的风险女性患抑郁症的可能性是男性的两倍，而且往往会出现更严重的身体症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Depression-increases-risk-of-menstrual-pain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Depression-increases-risk-of-menstrual-pain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0b9c3a6e-9b17-462f-bb42-bf4b9759d636 Tue, 26 Nov 2024 21:43:03 -0500 Depression increases risk of menstrual pain
水位上涨，风险增加：气候驱动的洪水对健康的影响气候变化引发的洪水在全球范围内造成了不断升级的健康风险，对弱势群体造成了不成比例的影响，同时需要创新的预防、准备和恢复战略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Rising-waters-rising-risks-The-health-impact-of-climate-driven-floods.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Rising-waters-rising-risks-The-health-impact-of-climate-driven-floods.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0d088cac-b889-4eb1-bdce-a6f5a81f9910 Tue, 26 Nov 2024 21:40:00 -0500 Rising waters, rising risks: The health impact of climate-driven floods
胎盘缺陷与先天性心脏病有关先天性心脏缺陷是人类出生缺陷最常见的形式，但我们仍然不完全了解导致它们的原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Placental-defects-linked-to-congenital-heart-defects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Placental-defects-linked-to-congenital-heart-defects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d55a67c8-3501-4b61-8221-fb6a000784cc Tue, 26 Nov 2024 21:35:57 -0500 Placental defects linked to congenital heart defects
